name: project-x-monorepo
description: Monorepo do Projeto X - Backend (NestJS) + Frontend (React + Vite)

scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.format: cd backend && npm run format && cd ../frontend && npm run format
